TopicTitle: mobile lab, why kerbals come out upside down

Articles.Content: hi, i have a little problem with mobile labs. i've built a base with them but kerbals coming out on one door upside down. i know in the space it doesnt matter, but on landed labs it looks silly... could it be changed pls?
You probably placed the lab upside down than
The lab has a door on each side. They come out one door right side up, and the other door upside down. Don't ask me why, but that's what happens.
